message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its unique value proposition, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,900,000. I'm confident we can find a mutually beneficial arrangement.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $1,700,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I appreciate you countering.  While your offer is closer to the mark, I'm targeting a price closer to $1,850,000.  I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and provide significant value.

I understand your position, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $1,650,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me, and I'm willing to meet you halfway.
